entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, introduced as a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is being presented with books by Gilderoy Lockhart.

entities.name: gilderoy lockhart
entities.description: A wizard who is introducing himself as the new Defence Against the Dark Arts teacher at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is presenting Harry Potter with his books.

entities.name: hogwarts school of witchcraft and wizardry
entities.description: A magical school where Harry Potter and Gilderoy Lockhart are associated with. It is mentioned as the place where Lockhart will be teaching.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Harry's friend, standing next to her new cauldron. She receives books from Harry.

relationships.description: Gilderoy Lockhart is presenting Harry Potter with his books. This is mentioned in the line 'The crowd cheered and clapped and Harry found himself being presented with the entire works of Gilderoy Lockhart.'
Harry Potter gives books to Ginny. This is mentioned in the line 'You have these,' Harry mumbled to her, tipping the books into the cauldron.'
